title: srI raguvara daasharatE
sahitya:
shrI raghuvara dAsharathE rAma

caraNam 1

 vandita suramuni brnda parAtpara mandaradhara shrI sundara rAma
   
caraNam 2

 shrIkara kOTi vibhAkara bhASa sudhAkara vadana karuNAkara rAma
   
caraNam 3

 sAtAtsAra purAri nutAgha vidAraNa shrI raghuvIra harE rAma
   
caraNam 4

 pAlita sujana vishAla nayana gOpAla vidhrta sharajAla harE rAma
   
caraNam 5

 agaNita guNa gaNa vikhalita mOha vihagarAja vara turaga shrI rAma
   
caraNam 6

 kAyajA janaka vinAyakanuta varadAyaka shrI raghunAyaka rAma
   
caraNam 7

 bhAvaja damana vibhAvita danuja bhAva mahAnubhAva harE rAma
   
caraNam 8

 sanakAdi vinuta kanakAbara dhara ina kula tilaka janaka sudhA rAma
   
caraNam 9

 rAkSasa gaNa mada sikSita dEvAdyakSa sArasa daLAkSa harE rAma
 
caraNam 10

 shankara sakha nisshankha mukhajita shashAnka suguNa sItanga harE rAma
 
caraNam 11

 rajAnala dinarAja su-nayana virAjita tyAgarAjanuta rAma
